### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE StockData (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_name VARCHAR(255),
    stock_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    stock_volume INT
);


CREATE TABLE StockHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    date DATE,
    opening_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT
);


CREATE TABLE MarketIndices (
    index_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    index_name VARCHAR(255),
    index_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);


CREATE TABLE InvestmentDecisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_id INT,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_description TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE StockData SET stock_price = 1500.00 WHERE stock_id = 1;

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    date DATE PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,

    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),

    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE company_info (
    symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sector VARCHAR(30),
    industry VARCHAR(30),
    headquarters VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE market_news (
    news_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_posted TIMESTAMP,
    source VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_portfolio (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    date_joined TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE investment_strategy (
    strategy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)
